reference_constraints.identity: Preserve the exact facial structure, proportions, eye shape, nose, lips, and skin tone from the reference image

subject.demographics: Young woman, fair skin tone (match reference exactly)
subject.hair: Dark brown hair, tied back in a low loose ponytail, natural flyaways visible, realistic texture

face.skin_texture: High fidelity natural skin texture with subtle imperfections, match reference
face.eyes: Green/hazel eyes, same shape and spacing as reference, looking at the camera
face.expression: Neutral to soft relaxed expression, realistic and unposed
face.makeup: Very minimal makeup, natural look, no heavy styling

subject.accessories: Small gold hoop earrings, subtle and realistic

apparel.fabric_texture: Soft cotton fleece, visible folds and natural creases

pose_and_composition.angle: Eye-level selfie perspective, arm slightly extended
pose_and_composition.body_position: Sitting upright on a sofa, relaxed posture
pose_and_composition.framing: Medium close-up, upper torso and shoulders in frame

environment.architectural_features: Large window with sheer white curtains
environment.furniture: Neutral-toned fabric sofa, wooden side table
environment.decor: Minimal decor, soft and realistic interior styling

lighting_and_atmosphere.source: Natural daylight from the side window
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadows: Subtle natural shadows, no harsh contrast

technical_specs.texture_quality: High fidelity skin and fabric textures
technical_specs.camera_behavior: Slight smartphone lens softness, realistic depth and perspective

generation_prompt: Photorealistic 4K HD image based strictly on the provided reference photo. Preserve the same person, facial structure, proportions, and identity without alteration. A young woman with dark brown hair tied back loosely, minimal makeup, and small gold hoop earrings, wearing a light gray oversized hoodie. She is sitting on a sofa in a modern living room with soft natural daylight coming from a side window through sheer curtains. Eye-level selfie perspective, relaxed candid pose, realistic skin texture with subtle imperfections, natural fabric folds, clean background, sharp focus, realistic smartphone photo aesthetic.
